thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Tillerson Cuts Short Africa Trip Amid ‘Pressing Demands’ in the U.S.

author: Matina Stevis-Gridneff
title: Tillerson Cuts Short Africa Trip Amid ‘Pressing Demands’ in the U.S.

organizations.name: tillerson cuts short africa trip amid

text:
NAIROBI, Kenya—U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson will cut short his first Africa tour and return to the U.S. a day earlier than planned, amid two major policy announcements by President Donald Trump—both with foreign- affairs implications. 
“Due to pressing demands in the U.S., Secretary Tillerson will return tonight [Monday] after concluding meetings in Chad and Nigeria,” Under Secretary Steve Goldstein said in an emailed statement.
...
